name: LemBlox
description:
Try and complete the levels by using as little LemBlox as possible, in the shortest time possible for the best score.

LemBlox is a lemmings clone based around the movement of squares, it was significant for me because the lemmings are 'smart enough' to figure out how to traverse any level using clever code which meant making the levels was the easy part. It also features a smooth selection system by just clicking and holding on the block you want to change and releasing on the colour you want to change it to.

P to pause and unpause. If you have any issues with a level due to slow play, restart in the pause menu.
